poem:
Title: "The Ballad of Tees Valley"

Houchen, minute by his majority,
In Tees Valley makes his claim,
Holding forth a lifeline, fleeting,
To Sunak in this political game.

Votes fall like ragged rain,
A 30% turnout's mighty refrain,
81,930 souls choose his name,
Still, the victory's not the same.

Bucking trends, the Tiger roars anew,
Plotting a course, a familiar view.
